long_description: our experienced and certified team can help your business with business analysis within dynamics 365 implementation or business audit services. for more then 10 years we implement and create solutions that are based on microsoft products, services and best practices. within or without implementation project we provide training and support services for dynamics 365 and office 365 services. call center, knowledge base, reservation of material / services, payment, work with claims and compensations. accounting and sale of materials, control of certification of personnel and partners. tcomtech is one of the leader of integration microsoft dynamics crm, in 2016 we were awarded for online crm implementation. the company has the largest expert evidence in cloud solutiions. 60+ successful implementations. we cooperate with many clients for a long time and help find solution due to business advancement. while creating microsoft eco-system of digital platform for client, we strive maximum to reach client's aims.
